name: Deposit Snatch
description:
You've just had a great night hosting a great party. However, you've made a mess.  

Secure getting your deposit returned by cleaning the room  before the  deadline. Won't be easy with they high standard though.

'Leave the room the way you received it"

This game was made  to be submitted to the Brackey's 4th game  jam.

The theme was is rewind, hope you're able to see how my game ties into that theme.
